Returns block hash by the given height.

URL: ```http://127.0.0.1:31112/json_rpc```
### Request: 
```json
{
  "id": 0,
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "method": "on_getblockhash",
  "params": [0]
}
```
### Request description: 
```

```

### Response: 
```json
{
  "id": 0,
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": "029f9443ff4fd829b784c83beef82bf4d3f24c2242cdd51191666fe728c27188"
}
```

### Response description: 
```

```
